rules_text:
When a creature scavenges Wanderer of Many, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Put a +1/+1 counter on the copy.
Scavenge {3}{U} [i]({3}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
